text: Sarah Clarke (born February 16, 1972) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Nina Myers on 24, and also for her roles as Ren√©e Dwyer in the 2008 movie Twilight and CIA Agent Lena Smith on the USA Network show Covert Affairs. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from St. Louis, Missouri
